{"id":554155531,"lang":"cpp","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1631530938,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/554155531/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Strings","memory":"6.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string addStrings(string num1, string num2) {\n        string ans=\"\";\n        int i=num1.size()-1,j=num2.size()-1,c=0;\n        while(c || i>=0 || j>=0){\n            if(i>=0)c+= num1[i--]-'0';\n            if(j>=0)c+= num2[j--]-'0';\n            ans+=(c%10+'0');\n            c/=10;\n        }\n        reverse(ans.begin(),ans.end());\n        return ans;        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-strings"}
